title: Number of registered voters in the United States 1996 to 2018
yAxis: Number of registered voters in millions
summary: Overall Number of registered voters in millions has increased over the Year.

Number of registered voters in millions is roughly constant from 1996 to 2000, slightly increasing from 2000 to 2004, roughly constant from 2004 to 2008, and finally slightly decreasing from 2008 to 2010.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2000 and 2004.
The highest Number of registered voters in millions, of value 146.31 was reached at Year 2008
Minimum Number of registered voters in millions about 127.66 was reached at Year 1996
